body: $ZIM not really concern about transport down but just concern y ZIM down 3% GNK and SBLK EAGLE are back to their ATH but ZIM still having downward trend. Therefore i wondering if there some news that is only impact on ZIM but no others. Or all others Shipping line that held onto ZIM are dumping their shares together after dividend is paid.

I know the broader transportation market correction has been frustrating for anyone that owns ZIM.  Please keep in mind that you're holding shares that paid out $21.50 per share in 2021 and will likely payout close to $24 in 2022.  That means you may be getting $2 per month per share on each share.
I know it's frustrating that they don't do a share buyback.  But
created_at: the price fluctuations caused by the dividend adjustments artificially jacks up the implied volatility every quarter.  So sell covered calls against your shares and try to squeeze an extra $0.50 per share in premium out of your shares.  So
column3: that's $30 per share per year in options premiums and dividends.
